alert.note: Alert for Dorchester (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 4:48PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Showers with gusty winds will impact portions of northern Dorchester County through 530 PM EST... At 448 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of showers with gusty winds along a line extending from Hartly to near Copperville to near Sheridan Point. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cambridge, Hurlock, Secretary, University Of Maryland Center For Environmental Studies, East New Market, Church Creek, Brookview, Eldorado, Madison, Hudson, Honga, Lloyds, Taylors Island, Woolford, Bucktown and Linkwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
